resources.string:
I wrote this app to fix my Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra refresh rate bug, sometimes refresh rate is very low (~30fps) after waking up the phone, waking it up again results a constant 120Hz. The fix seems to be only temporary, after some time something fucks up again, thank you Samsung!

The app targets Android L api 21 to avoid permission problems: android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS. The refresh rate is reset in 4 steps:

‣ sets the min refresh rate to a low value
‣ sets the peak refresh rate to a low value
‣ resets the min refresh rate
‣ resets the peak refresh rate

The problem can also be solved via adb commands in order:

‣ adb shell settings put system min_refresh_rate 10
‣ adb shell settings put system peak_refresh_rate 60
‣ adb shell settings put system min_refresh_rate reset
‣ adb shell settings put system peak_refresh_rate reset
